message:
Feat: Add SSE streaming, cloud TTS, and AudioPlayer

- Add SSE streaming support for real-time response display
  - New SSEParser.kt for Server-Sent Events parsing
  - OpenClawClient.sendMessageStream() returns Flow<StreamEvent>
  - ChatViewModel and OpenClawSession branch on streamingEnabled setting
  - Progressive message updates via Room DB (create on first chunk, update on subsequent)
  - TTS starts at first sentence boundary via Channel<String> feeding TTSOrchestrator

- Add cloud TTS providers (OpenAI, ElevenLabs, Fish Audio)
  - TTSOrchestrator routes to configured provider with local fallback
  - TTSProvider interface with OpenAI, ElevenLabs, and Fish Audio implementations
  - AudioPlayer for URL/byte-based audio playback via MediaPlayer

- Add streaming toggle in Settings (default enabled)
- Update network security config for user-installed CA certificates
- Add .ai/ feature docs and .claude/ config

Merge pull request #22 from yuga-hashimoto/feat-allow-cleartext

Feat: Allow cleartext traffic (HTTP)
Feat: Allow cleartext traffic (HTTP) for local/VPN usage (Fixes #21)

Merge pull request #20 from yuga-hashimoto/fix-custom-ca

Feat: Add network security config to trust user CA
Feat: Add network security config to trust user-installed CA certificates (Fixes #19)
Docs: Update config references to openclaw.json and use JSON format
